website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Xperia X is an unlocked Android phone with good overall performance, but it's priced too high for what you get.
pros: Most bloatware, including stock apps, can be uninstalled

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I had ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst phone I had ever owned - that having bought it first hand. From onset: Fingerprint was hit and miss. Battery life wasn't great. After a year: Rear camera failed. Battery would not charge half of the time. This phone drove me away from Sony after 15 years. Keep well away.
customer_reviews.author: Sas Maheswaran

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is why ordering a second hand phone is not always the greatest idea. Previously I ordered the Sony X compact which was in an immaculate condition and to my taste. The same seller was promoting the bigger X. Apparently there are differences between X and X compact Even worse the fingerprint sensor has a dead slot and certain times simply does not work My recommendation? XPERIA X is a good phone but you might find far better deals
customer_reviews.author: Alexandros

customer_reviews.title: Never ending updates
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 days solid to update it from when it arrived brand new so be prepared for 72 hours of no phone because it is unusable during this time. The fingerprint reader doesn't really work that well. The camera might be lots of megapixels but it takes ages to take the photo from when you click it.
customer_reviews.author: M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just not a good phone
customer_reviews.text: While the battery life and screen quality are decent, the phone often suffers from slowdown and lack of responsiveness. The rear camera has suddenly stopped working (due to a loose connection I believe). All in all, a disappointing phone and I'd expect better from Sony. I replaced my old Google Nexus 6 with this, and it was a noticeable step down in quality from the older budget phone - camera is worse, performance is worse
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bennis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for at least 2 years now - the Soft Skin effect is applied to front camera pictures automatically, even when I disable this useless setting. Reported this to Sony when I got the phone, but 2 years later and it hasn't been fixed. Lots of people online are complaining about the same issue, and yet Sony keeps ignoring them.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value mobile phone. Fast, reliable and very good quality. Better than most at price.
customer_reviews.author: Smartzone

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 weeks save up and buy a half decent phone it was quite slow
customer_reviews.author: Stuart kirk

customer_reviews.title: OK for price.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is OK, not the best but for the price is OK for me. Arrived in Spanish default language, no delivery note. Had to Google vendor to get their details. UK business.
customer_reviews.author: Miss F C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an old one of the same model so knew what i was getting Happy
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First touch phone I've had very impressed with it. Fast easy to use. Good price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always had a Sony xperia phone always will if they keep producing this type of quality
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but have some scratches on display and there was no real photo in the auction. Im half happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz

customer_reviews.title: brilliant Camera & video
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast, brilliant Camera & video, terrific colours. Worth it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone worth the price brilliant. Only bad thing, which has nothing to do with the phone is that I was given earphones that had uneven ear peices. (one longer then the other). But i recommend this phone well worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: everything worked right from the start Great camera (for a phone) and I have no hesitation ...
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with this phone, everything worked right from the start Great camera (for a phone) and I have no hesitation recommending it
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: such a good phone. the camera is really good
customer_reviews.text: such a good phone. the camera is really good, I have no problems with this phone and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is very good. Is running smooth and without issues. OS has been updated few day ago to Android Nougat. Battery last 1 day on normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Good price and it was delivered quicker then I was told tnx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but there's probably cheaper that function just as well
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very quick next-day delivery as requested and packaged very well by the seller (no problems whatsoever with reseller). Phone functions very well but I do not feel it's worth double the value of the new Moto G (2016) which I first purchased but only retuned it because it was too large (a phablet essentially). Only reason I didn't get the Moto G compact is because the tech spec was not great. Hope this helps. But all-in-all the Sony Xperia is a very good standard Android phone (there's probably a lot cheaper that work as well i.e. Moto G compact et al)
customer_reviews.author: larryb2001

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Great display, I cannot see the individual pixels and I like the curved edges, didn't think I would. Fingerprint tech works really well, can input up to 5 fingerprints and it's really useful for things like PayPal and banking as well as easily unlocking the phone
customer_reviews.author: NSH

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone only gripe is spent £300 on phone & amazon had the cheek to charge me postage
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, and I the screen is stunning
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, and I the screen is stunning, the software and the camera are unlike I've seen on any other phone. All round great phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible phone. Screen is beautiful, battery is amazing. I can't find a thing about it that's bad haha a great phone
customer_reviews.author: Jake F.

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm always using Sony phone. It won't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good mobile phone.
customer_reviews.text: Received this mobile phone promptly, just what I wanted the Sony phones are well made .had a M2 before but as with most phones the mic started to go,the only thing that I can't adjust too is when you start up you have to swipe the screen to the left, I only had to swipe to the right.the camera is very good, nice clear photos.the Battery is better than the M2 I had previously. I have now gone over to 4G as well with my provider so todate I have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: clarke one

customer_reviews.title: This is overall a great phone. I am not going to write a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a great phone.I am not going to write a detailed review but here are a few statements based on my experience: 1. Takes good pictures 2. RAM is not enough if you want to play games and run demanding apps. Device only has 2.78GB RAM available. 3. Build quality is very good. 4. Screen size is decent and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: IvanD

customer_reviews.title: At first quite frustated that the signal is very low ...
customer_reviews.text: At first quite frustated that the signal is very low for 4G. Even it can't connect using mobile data. It need to connect to WiFi first and Download the Internet setting, after that it can connect using mobile data
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is basically the Xperia Z5 but with a new letter
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY
customer_reviews.text: Said was Unlocked but was Locked to EE, but I never got a Chance to Put my Sim in as was as Dead as a Doornail - It came with *NO CABLE*............ I tried with 2 different cables of my own and the import port was faulty - No Charging - Went to Tescos and Purchased a Charging Cable (Brand New) and the New cable not working - I do Not understand how it got their Quality Control............. What a waste of my Time, down in my Pocket and a Lesson Learned......................... AVOID - AVOID - AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Declan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It is as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: My first smart phone so not easy to make a comparison but it is exactly what I was expecting. Nice and easy to use, great display and does everything I want it to. Only issues so far are: SIM holder is a bit fiddly but not too bad if you install it with the phone face down; I can't find out how to change the intensity or length of vibration so with the sound off I have not noticed incoming texts. Pretty minor really. Now into its third year and still performing brilliantly. It has been an excellent purchase and retains its 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Not the best phone
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the phone when I got it, however the sound suddenly stopped working after 5 months. This seems to be a common problem with Sony Xperia X. The communication with the seller was great and he gave me the full refund in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela O

customer_reviews.title: Dead after less than 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Owned for less than 9 months and the charging port has broken. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Mobile
customer_reviews.text: It good because my old Sony Z3 I've replacement a new one it no problem it excellent technics it perfect. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! It's so sleek and quick, I absolutely love it. The postage was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Bríd

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2016 and to this day its the best phone I've ever bought. No reason to upgrade as far I'm concerned. Fast, responsive and easily upgrade the storage space
customer_reviews.author: ChubbyChuckles

customer_reviews.title: love it. i'm not a tekkie and have not ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. i'm not a tekkie and have not had many smart phones before but i find this fast and powerful. its everything i wanted in a phone.
customer_reviews.author: si

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, really smart phone. Good battery life. This phone shoots way higher than its price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: kcl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best phone i have ever had at a great low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia Fan
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. I simply love this celphone. Everithing is great.! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gimenez

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the phone. Although, the box wasn't sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia X UK Sim free smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone by Sony with super sharp camera. Equipped with latest version of Android. Slim phone with good sized clear screen and not too bulky for trouser pocket. Got it at a price that represents great value for a well specified smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: AndyJ

customer_reviews.title: Good choice of mobile phone.
customer_reviews.text: Not had a Sony Xperia before,only had it a week but I am loving it does everything I want it to, can't really rate the camera yet as I have only used it a couple of times but everything looks good really good clear pictures, l love the dedicated camera button on the side, to sum up I am very pleased I choose the Sony after reading all the reviews I think I choose the right phone for me.
customer_reviews.author: waltert

customer_reviews.title: 2nd hand phone and network locked.
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received is great but it is second hand and lock to some network, I have no idea which but it won't work on Three. No where in the description is it mentioned that it is locked or second hand, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Frost

customer_reviews.title: Graphics are fantastic, the camera is unbelievable (you can get good ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous phone. Graphics are fantastic, the camera is unbelievable (you can get good depth of field and bokeh even from the auto setting!). Good battery life too. It was bought for my mother but both myself and partner agree we will upgrade to this phone when ours are finished. I played with the XZ in a shop to see what the difference is and I can't tell. Not sure why the XZ exists when this is so good at two hundred pounds cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Camo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia X
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my Sony Xperia Z1. Very good battery life of 5 to 7 days. (I use it for phoning and text & the check the weather. Blue tooth & Wifi on all the time). Charges quickly. Wonderful clear screen. Not overly large like some others but not to small either. Very quick responding to everything. The finger print scanner works almost every time. (Not with muddy or wet hands though). Shame many of the useless apps can not be installed, but that is the same with all mobiles. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Murrey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantabulous
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, amazing service, you will not regret!!, Congratulations on making a customer happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Salim

customer_reviews.title: looked good but software needs a bit of work
customer_reviews.text: A bit of lag...........looked good but software needs a bit of work. Sound is OK, screen is fine but for the money there are much better phones out there. Sold it after 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK but uninspiring
customer_reviews.text: Xperia Z were great phones, unfortunately too much glass. Xperia X no improvement I am afraid. Metallic back a plus. OK but uninspiring.
customer_reviews.author: BL

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia X 32GB SIM Free Smartphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Experian X's Smart capture technology helps you banish blur. Enabled by Sony's new predictive hybrid autofocus, Smart capture lets you choose a person or object and automatically track it. Now your subject stays in focus, even when moving and the most unpredictable scenes come out in the sharpest detail. Our fastest camera yet goes from standby to capture in less than 0.6 sands. With the quick start up, lightning speed Hybrid Autofocus and faster image processing, you can capture the most spontaneous moments. Low-light selfies aren't easy, but Experian X was built for the challenge. With 13 megapixels and Sony's renowned low-light sensors, this is the front camera for round-the-clock sharpness. Crafted with a seamless metal back, the Experian X is an undeniable stunner. And with the curved glass edges of its display and perfect 5" size, it's as much a pleasure to hold as behold. We've designed Experian X to comfortably fit your hand, your routines and your taste. We've refined the user interface to make it more intuitive than ever and continued with a form that makes a statement with its simplicity. Choose from four colours - graphite black, white, lime gold or rose gold. Each one has been chosen to complement your personal style without taking over. Experian X boasts Sony's Smart battery management that brings you up to two days battery life and longer battery lifespan. There's never a good time for your phone to quit. Whether you're mid-run or deep in a group chat. Experian X's marathon battery brings you up to two days1 of power from every charge, so you can do what you love for longer. Explore more, connect more and skip the charger in your overnight bag. While most smartphone batteries quickly decline in strength, Experian X delivers our longest battery lifespan. Ground-breaking novo adaptive charging maintains battery health while charging.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Smartphone 1 x Battery
feature_bullets: 23 MP camera for the fastest moments
Battery life that keeps you charged for days
Every charge is a vitamin kick for your phone
Our smartest camera predicts movement for sharper pictures

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
